<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change the applicability_script column definition for the OneAPI one_api_service_plan_feature table.</description>
        <name>Fix OneAPI applicability_script column</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.get('4709915af926011018f97de5f998ed48');
	if (gr.isValid()) {
		var newDefaultValue = "(function(featureInput, previousFeatureOutputs) {/* customize condition logic here, return true or false */return true;})(featureInput, previousFeatureOutputs)";
		gr.setValue('default_value', newDefaultValue);
		gs.info(gr.update());
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-04 17:09:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6af92e57eb220110715301c7c15228a8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix OneAPI applicability_script column</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="One API" source="com.glide.oneapi">f57df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37fd8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6af92e57eb220110715301c7c15228a8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-04 17:37:27</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
